channel.title: What you can do with an IP?
channel.description: I heard someone say that you can find out someones telephone number, address, state, time zone and stuff from their IP.. but how do you go about doing that? I want to scare the ass admins on counter-strike

item.title: What you can do with an IP?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:31, topic:3726”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=4557.msg46474#msg46474 date=1150061408]

Shitty, how old are you? 10? Seriously, how old?

Frank_ is awesome.

I need to hang out here more, I’ve never even seen frank_ before

He’s like, the inventor of the RSC private server

What the hell?? There were/are RSC private servers!

Either I don’t look in the private server section enough, or that stuff is older than me. [size=8pt]Takes a peak in private server section[/size]
[/quote]

Theres a section for it in the community members private area

Poopy, you got your answer. It’s a NO.[/quote]

Dammit! Everything I have a slight interest in is in the CM section!
Makes ‘Play Runescape’ Script to become CM

Read full topic

item.title: What you can do with an IP?
item.dc:creator: @poopy4231 poopy4231
item.description:
@poopy4231 wrote:

Shut up why are you always pissing people off… finding out where someone lives by their ip isnt breaking the law dumbass…

its perfectly legal its the part where calling them and doing stuff to them is where its illegal

Stop flaming the fuck out of me*

Read full topic

item.title: What you can do with an IP?
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

LOL its amazing how little people seem to know about anything and how often they act as though they know.

If you were to somehow manage to get the details you seek, if sure you will have broken several major privacy laws. It’s much much easier for authorities to find out exactly who and where you are than it was to go through what you have done.

I’m guessing that you were banned from a CS server and want to try to scare them into unbanning you by pretending to be a 1337 h4x0|2 ?

Read full topic

item.title: What you can do with an IP?
item.dc:creator: @Xerxes Xerxes
item.description:
@Xerxes wrote:

[quote=“doomsday, post:13, topic:3726”]dude jme_009 your such a big noob,

okay to start with you need the isp name, then you can go to there website, now you need to find an exploit such as cgi or php or sql or xss, then you can use the exploit to gain access to there database, then you can find out the address of each and every paying customer…

now if you want instuctions on how to do that, then you can pm me, moparisthebest doesnt support this so i cant post here[/quote]

That’s called being a script kiddie.

And you know it’s that easy?

Do you even know anything or did you just go read some article and you just saying stuff you read from that? Do you actually know anything? No you don’t.

Ever heard of encryption? Ever heard that those information could be encrypted? You think it’s that easy, ya, just get a exploit and exploit tthen youre in datebase and get all the stuff…

as jme said, you don’t know a shit. you just thinking you do kthx.

and as greeny said, how the hell do you know they keep info in their datebase on the website???

Summary:
You are dumb. You suck. Byebye.

Read full topic

item.title: What you can do with an IP?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

The ISP has all the client information for each IP, but that’s not public access…the most information you can really get is a relative location (which isn’t very reliable always either…most tell me I live about 300 miles away from where I actyally do :))

Read full topic
